medical_history.history_of_present_illness: Worsening abdominal pain began 3 days post laparoscopic cholecystectomy. On postoperative day 3, the patient also developed dyspnea.
medical_history.past_medical_history: Myotonic dystrophy, attention deficit disorder, previous laparoscopic cholecystectomy with umbilical hernia repair, ERCP with pancreatic duct stent.
medical_history.family_history: Sister with myotonic dystrophy, who is s/p tracheostomy.
